name: Which Is Real
description:
Heavily Inspired by Squid Game :)

You are kidnapped by someone and u have to land on the real blocks and skip the ones which aren't real. Touch the portal to go to the next level.

How To Download And Play (Please do read):  To download the game click the download zip button, once downloaded extract the file and open the Application file. For most people a Windows would say that this file is insecure please click on more info and then click Run Anyway. This file cause no harm to your device.

Controls: WASD to move SPACE to jump

Software used: 

Coding: Visual Studio

Game Development: Unity

Modeling: Blender

Art: Unity

Made By: SinTex
